references.paper_title: Video generation models as world simulators
references.reason: This paper is a foundational work in video generation, and its models are used as baselines for comparison in the current research.
This paper introduced denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a fundamental technique used in many video generation models, including those in this paper.
This paper presents scalable diffusion models using transformers, a significant architectural advancement used in this research to improve video generation.

references.paper_title: Movie Gen: A cast of media foundation models
references.reason: This paper introduces a benchmark dataset for video generation models, which is used in this research to evaluate the performance of their models.
This paper presents a novel training objective used in this research to improve the quality and coherence of generated videos.
